website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for women and girls who dabble in the sport, but serious ice hockey players may find their performance and wear limited.
pros: Well-made women's skates with thick padding that also come in some sizes that are suitable for teens
Ladies rave about the aesthetic quality that is a combination of tough yet feminine style
cons: Some women complain that the support is limited, and while lacing them tightly helps, the result may be irritated shins
Finding the right size is confusing

customer_reviews.title: Good overall quaility. Follow their size recommendations, NOT standard hockey skate sizing.
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected if you read the other reviews and follow their size chart. Unlike standard hockey skates, you DO NOT size down, but rather size up one from your normal shoe size. I bought these specifically for the laces/Velcro at the ankle combo. It makes for a very secure fit. Others stated these arrived pre-sharpened. Mine, however, not certainly did not. This was a $5 fix at my local rink, but for the inaccuracy in product description I dock 1 Star (I’d only knock off a half star if that were an option because these are otherwise stellar.) Perfect for a skating enthusiast who prefers hockey over figure skates.
customer_reviews.author: AgletBaby

customer_reviews.title: Cool🕶️
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Mine looked exactly like the pic. I was expecting the purple with flowers. But i was cool with eirther. Design. Theyre great for first timer or recreational use. I used to buy hockey skates through bower. And these are not that bad for the price. If youre looking for first time or occasional hockey skates. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Clark

customer_reviews.title: The boot is very comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: The boot is very comfortable and well made. Just slightly too big (I ordered a half size up per reviews of the boot running too small) I feel like I should have ordered my normal boot size. Nonetheless, they get the job done. Also, they are a bit hard to tie tightly so there's some lack of stability in the ankle. I'm not out doing anything crazy, just leisurely skating so it's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D

customer_reviews.title: Great, order one size up
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I have not used these to actually skate yet but I am pleased with my purchase. BUY A SIZE UP! For sure. I am always a size 8 medium. Always. I ordered a size 9 and they're perfect. They're very wide so I will likely have to wear a couple pairs of socks, but if I had ordered an 8, my toes would have been crunched for sure. ORDER ONE SIZE UP.
customer_reviews.author: DD2

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! We gonna keep them because we already use them... but they look very big even though they're not if it comes to size... don't look impressive... got to admit that they are pretty light... the most important thing is that they're not very sharp so now we have to spend money to sharpen them...not cool... my son's ice skates after couple seasons are sharper than these ones... looking cool at the picture but that's about it...
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: love my new skates! i'm new to skating, and my kids love it, so i decided to join them and skate too. i hadn't skated since i was in high school and that was only a few times since it hurt my legs so much. THESE do NOT hurt your legs! they fit so nicely (true to shoe size!) and my feet didn't hurt after skating either! would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Hockey Skates.
customer_reviews.text: Great Hockey Skates! I read the reviews on a lot of skates, including reviews on these skates before purchasing them. I love these skates! I did have to exchange them for a larger size, so I could wear an extra pair of socks in them. If you are looking for a skate that has a little bit more room for feet that are a little wide, these are great. I have not been on skates for years, so I decided to try Hockey Skates and these are just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Moodie

customer_reviews.title: I am 9.5 got size 10 and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: OMG they fit just right! Super comfortable! For beginner like me I strongly recommend! I am 9.5 street size and got me 10 and it's just perfect! Read reviews first before buying :) good luck to me on the ice now!
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute skates but I’m a size 10 and that’s what I ordered and received and they are too small so I’m having to return them (Amazon’s return policy is great and it’s free shipping, so 5 stars for them!) If a size 11 was available I’d probably order it, but the Velcro also catches on things and the laces are round and dug into my hands when I tried getting them tight enough, so in a way I’m glad that I’ll have to look for another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkins_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable - but I guess my feet aren't the same size. While the left boot fit fine, the right boot mashed my big toe. Wasn't bearable - returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Erez

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I saw that some people recieved skates with different design but mine came in just like the picture! I read the reviews and got one size bigger and they fit perfectly. I skated with them today and they have so much ankle support! I noticed that the knuckle of my right big toe is a bit sore but I'm just breaking them in so I don't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Size up, bulky
customer_reviews.text: I wear a ladies 8 and sized up to a 9 based on reviews. They are still small but I fear if I returned for the 10 they'd surely be huge. This skate is bulky bc of the padding, runs very wide as well. Not very comfortable in my opinion. I also purchased new and they were clearly a return, still had Christmas wrapping paper on it and box was damaged. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: Product that arrived does not match the photo
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for skates that match the look of the product image. Don’t order! What arrived is a gray skate with a weird purple floral print on the sides rather than gray and white in the image. Hence the 1 star rating. As for the skates themselves - they have plenty of padding and fit my wife’s feet fine. We ordered a size larger, but a half size bigger would be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: COLIN ODONOGHUE

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for me and my daughter and they were VERY uncomfortable. They made your feet lean painfully up against one side. I returned both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Y

customer_reviews.title: These run VERY small
customer_reviews.text: Even though I bought one full size larger than I normally wear, these were still WAY too tight. Returned them and bought a different brand that fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these skates
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with a good fit. I usually wear a size 8 shoe (sometimes 8.5) so I went with a size 9 skate. I wore them for about an hour and a half with no foot or ankle pain whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Ethnea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but don't order smaller than what you need
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a 9 in regular shoes, order a 9 for these. I ordered an 8, to small. I'm reordering a 9.
customer_reviews.author: MT Chick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the price! They are a little wide and a little short, but they are pretty comfy still and work well and hold up well on the ice. Excited to have them!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Nicole Sievers

customer_reviews.title: Different Design
customer_reviews.text: The product looked nothing like the picture. The skates that came had a purple swirly design. I returned them with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid pair of skates especially since I got them ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 and the 9 is tight but i would worry about the 10 being to big. Good solid pair of skates especially since I got them 70% off from amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyB7

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot, great recreational skate. Laces were far to long for what was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy, attractive skate
customer_reviews.text: As depicted and descripted. Great item for the money or otherwise. Remember to bump up at least one size, nevermind the chart..
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates!
customer_reviews.text: These skates run about a half size small. I wear 7.5 and I ordered an 8. They fit perfectly! They have great ankle support and come sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Thompson

customer_reviews.title: great skates
customer_reviews.text: My daughter kept getting the toe of the figure skates stuck causing her to fall. Most hockey skates we found did not give her enough ankle support. These skates gave her everything she needed, plus they are easy to lace.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Guay

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my daughter and decided to get a pair for myself. I find they fit fine, they skate well, I had no problems using them when I went to the local outdoor park rink. I am looking forward to getting more use out of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY M DAUGHERTY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the ice skates and they fit great. Great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Girl 44

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: These skates fit well. They do need to be sharpened first thing before skating on them. After breaking them in they are amazing. It is a bit hard to get the laces tight enough. I do recommend these if you are getting serious about skateting and want something cute and comfortable. I wear between a size 8-9 and got a size 8 they fit grate.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Winn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM!!! they are so sharp looking and feel and work great. extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used them twice and I'm not very happy with these skates. I had to throw out my Nike skates after 10 years and these are more for beginners. I did not want to spend a lot of money just to go skating once or twice a year, but thought these would work. Fit is ok, but the shaft only gives you good support when tied relaly tight. But then your ankle and shin will hurt.
customer_reviews.author: love2buy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my mom for her birthday because she loves ice skating and the moment she put them on, she said they were perfect; she loves them, thank you so much Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Huesca Abascal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged for a larger size but it still is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go one size down from your shoe size
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty comfy and cute. Great price too. I use them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Rita Malak

customer_reviews.title: Skater
customer_reviews.text: Cute skates but little stiff and small had to return
customer_reviews.author: P J S.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: These were in perfect condition. My daughter loves them and said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rlt78

customer_reviews.title: Love them! True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 and I ordered a 9 and they are perfect. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great skates. They were listed as used, but they seem new to me. They are comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: customer90210

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return do to my daughter wanted figure skates.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Great value - Will save money over rental skates
customer_reviews.text: My wife takes our girls skating every week during the winter. Our local rink charges $5 a person over the age of five. Most weeks it is only her and the three kids. You can't beat an entire ice rink to yourself for $10. A skate rental is also $5 each. These rapidly paid for themselves and there is no worry about sharing skates. Good build for just goofing off with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Girouard

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyment for hours and hours....
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my daughter and she has used them now for a couple months. Loves the, Durable. Interesting design.....but worthy of your consideration. I can tell you they have brought hours of enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: steve L

customer_reviews.title: Lady's be careful when ordering these skates
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering this item I was sent men's ice skates instead of women's soft boot hockey skates not only once but twice. The picture on on the box clearly showed and said men's size 10 figure skates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blade was off center - not usable
customer_reviews.text: While the skates were very comfortable, the blade on the left skate was off center making it impossible to skate or walk on it. If I could have exchanged the item, I would probably have tried another pair, but I couldn't so I just returned them. I'm sure I would have loved them otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great skates but order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my wife. She is normally a size 9 but after reading the reviews I ordered a size 10 and they fit her perfectly. She has yet to skate in them but has had them on and says they are very comfortable and supportive. They are very stylish and seem like they are made very well. So as others have said order a size up or at least a half size from what you normally wear as they do run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Butch K

customer_reviews.title: Love these skates!
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates! First time in my life I can skate with warm feet, no pinching and they stay tight well. The laces are long, but I wrap them around my ankles before tying, then bring the tied ends up and secure them behind the Velcro strap. I got them big enough to wear heavy socks under them.
customer_reviews.author: Honmom

product_meta.title: American Athletic Shoe Co.Women’s American Soft Boot hockey Skate
product_meta.description:
This fashionable soft boot women's hockey skate is designed for women who prefer hockey blades. The skate has cushy foam padding with fiber lining for long lasting warmth and comfort. The skate features a speed lacing system with strap, multi layered ankle support and a steel runner hockey blade.

FEATURES:

 * Soft boot hockey skate for non-competitive ice hockey and recreation
 * Thick foam padding for warmth and comfort
 * Multi-layered boot for ankle support
 * Stainless steel hockey blade
 * Sizing true to shoe size
feature_bullets: Soft boot hockey skate for non-competitive ice hockey and recreation
Thick foam padding for warmth and comfort
